name: Bouncy Box (MysteriousDeveloper)
description:
Welcome to Bouncy Box.

You are a box that just escaped from the warehouse - bounce off shelves to get higher and higher!

I made this game for the #172 Trijam, whose theme was "Off the shelf".

This game took me two hours to make, so is nothing special in terms of gameplay, and probably won't be updated.

If you're interested in something I made that I intend to update regularly, then check out VVV!
